name: You Are A Cat !
description:
You Are A Cat! An infinite platformer featuring an exploring cat and a lot of pixel art!

You are a  cat who wants to explore the outside world, but beware! You will need to jump over the obstacles in your way...

This game includes: 

  • A cat (obviously...)
  • Multiplayer mode!
  • Lots of pixel art!
  • Music!
  • and much more...
⭐Feedback⭐

If you have permission, please give feedback at the bottom of this page. It will be greatly appreciated and may be used in a future version of the game!

Credits: 
  • Lead Developer: WebCoder49
  • Graphics: Jed and S
  • Inspiration, more graphics etc.: A lot more people!

Thank you to all who are involved.
